name: Wingin' It (Tal Sharon, Tikapo, JonatanVider)
description:
Description:

Soar to new heights with the beak-endowed bird in this quirky physics platformer game. Join the adventure and peck your way to the nest, overcoming obstacles along the way. 

How To Play:

Online with a keyboard: Simply click "Run Game" to play.
Press the "Fullscreen" icon on the lower right edge in the game window.  
Keyboard Controls:

  • Up-Arrow key - Jump
  • Left & Right-Arrow keys - Movement
  • Spacebar key - Peck the trees
  • P Key - Pause (Menu)
  • R Key - Reset (Home)

On your PC: Simply download the game and play.
Keyboard Controls: (Same as above)
Xbox controls (Mac version):

  • A - Jump 
  • B - Peck the trees
  • Joystick - Movement

Credits:

This project was created as part of the "Digital Game" course 
at Bezalel Academy of Art and Design, in collaboration with the Game-Development Division of the School of Computer Science & Engineering at The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.

Link to VC at Bezalel Academy of Art & Design

Link to CSE at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem

Awesome Music & SFX by: Itamar Haggai
